name: RefundOrder
description:
Triggers a refund request for the given Order.

The amount to refund is optional, if not specified it will be the amount available to refund on the order.

properties.name: WaitForCompletion
properties.description: Handle all the refund in process, this can take a long time if multiple transactions are involved.

properties.name: AmountAvailableToRefund
properties.description: Only set when WaitForCompletion is true

properties.name: CreatedTransactions
properties.description: Only set when WaitForCompletion is true
